com.google.android.exoplayer2.extractor.mkv

Class Sniffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.extractor.mkv.Sniffer

  • final class Sniffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class that peeks from the input stream in order to determine whether it appears to be compatible input for this extractor.

    • Field Summary
